attributes.action: Build 3 new Royal Navy aircraft carriers, as opposed to just 2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you may have heard, 2 new aircraft carriers are to be built for the Royal Navy. But you may also have heard that the Royal Navy is getting ever smaller and less capable.

Please sign this petition to have 3 new aircraft carriers built.

Thanks
